user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and role-based security mechanisms for user access.
epics.description: This epic focuses on implementing a secure authentication system using multi-factor authentication (MFA) to protect customer access. It also defines role-based access controls (RBAC) ensuring that users only interact with data and features permitted by their roles. The solution must include encrypted login sessions, session timeout policies, authentication logs, and alignment with banking security standards. Sensitive customer credentials and authorization data will be securely stored and managed under strict compliance guidelines.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Profile Overview
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying banking products and services tailored to the customer profile.
epics.description: This epic addresses the design and development of a dynamic user dashboard presenting relevant account information, product offerings, and recommendations based on user profiles. It will interface with internal data analytics and eligibility engines to provide personalized insights. The dashboard should also allow quick navigation to account management, transaction history, and service modification features while maintaining a visually appealing and intuitive layout.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to open new accounts and modify existing services using guided digital workflows.
epics.description: This epic covers the implementation of structured and simplified workflows for account opening and service modification requests. Customers should be able to upload mandatory documents, validate data in real time, and save unfinished applications for later completion. The workflows must connect to the bank’s backend core systems via secure APIs for validation, approval, and request processing, providing transparency and efficiency throughout the process.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide customers with real-time status updates and automated notifications on all requests.
epics.description: This epic ensures that customers can monitor the progress of their requests, such as account openings or service changes, in real time via the portal. Automated notifications will be triggered at key stages and sent via email or in-app messages. The module should include configurable notification templates, event-based triggers, and integration with the core system to reflect live updates, enhancing customer engagement and operational transparency.

epics.title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Maintain an extensive record of user interactions, requests, and activities for transparency and compliance.
epics.description: This epic focuses on building an auditable interaction history enabling users to view their past activities, requests, and changes to accounts or services. The audit trail will also serve compliance and security purposes, ensuring traceability and accountability. All entries must be immutable, encrypted, and easily retrievable for administrative or regulatory analysis. Historical data retention policies will comply with banking standards and customer privacy laws.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
epics.summary: Deliver a responsive, mobile-optimized, and accessible interface ensuring consistent performance across devices.
epics.description: This epic covers the creation of a responsive and accessible front-end design that guarantees seamless user experiences across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The interface design must comply with accessibility standards such as WCAG 2.1, ensuring usability for customers with diverse needs. It should feature adaptive layouts, scalable components, and minimal load times to ensure efficiency. User feedback mechanisms will be included for continuous usability enhancement.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration and Data Management Layer
epics.summary: Integrate with core banking systems while ensuring independent, high-performance data management within the portal.
epics.description: This epic involves establishing secure integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s existing core banking architecture. APIs or middleware will be developed to synchronize requests, account data, and transaction processes between systems. The portal will maintain an internal database optimized for performance and scalability, handling operational workflows, user sessions, and cached requests independently. Emphasis will be placed on data encryption, error handling, and recovery to ensure reliability and performance consistency.

user_stories.title: Enable multi-factor authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains secure even if my password is compromised.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The authentication mechanism must support both OTP and biometric methods. It should be easy to use and seamless.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Successful authentication requires both username/password and a second verification method.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have a valid username and password, When I log in, Then I should be prompted for a second verification method.

user_stories.title: Set up role-based access control
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want role-based access control, so that users can only access appropriate sections of the system.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles include customer, service agent, and admin with specific access permissions defined for each role.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can only view and manage sections of the system as per their corresponding role.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a customer role, When accessing admin sections, Then access should be denied.

user_stories.title: Display account balances and transactions
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see my account balances and recent transactions, so that I can keep track of my financial activity.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should update account balances and recent transaction history in real-time.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Displayed account balances and transactions should reflect accurate and up-to-date information.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have recent transactions, When I access the dashboard, Then I should see my latest account balance and transaction history.

user_stories.title: Show recommended banking services
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see recommended services, so that I can explore new banking products that match my profile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Recommendations should be based on user profile data and eligibility criteria for various products.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Recommendations should be relevant to the user's profile and change dynamically based on eligibility.
user_stories.test_cases: Given my user profile details, When I access the dashboard, Then I should see relevant recommended services.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Streamline account opening process
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an easy account opening workflow, so that I can open new accounts with minimal effort.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The workflow should support document upload, form validation, and save incomplete applications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The account opening process should guide the user smoothly and clearly state the required steps.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I want to open a new account, When I follow the workflow, Then I should be able to complete the process with minimal errors.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Support service modification requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify my existing services, so that I can update my account settings and features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Modifications should be seamless and guide the user through the required steps and feature updates.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Service modification should be completed in a few simple steps with clear guidance and validations.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I want to modify an existing service, When I follow the modification workflow, Then I should be able to complete the request.

user_stories.title: Implement real-time tracking for requests
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to track my service requests in real-time, so that I can be informed of their current status.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The tracking module must provide updated status changes in real-time for account and service requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should see up-to-date status information and recent changes for their requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have submitted a service request, When I check the tracking module, Then I should see the current status of my request.

user_stories.title: Send automated notifications for key status changes
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive notifications for key status changes, so that I am informed about the progress of my requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Notifications should be sent for key changes such as submission, approval, and completion of requests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should receive timely notifications for important status changes in their service requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a change in my service request status, When the status updates, Then I should receive an email notification and an in-portal alert.

user_stories.title: Log and display user interactions
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to log all user interactions, so that I can ensure compliance and monitor actions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Interactions should be securely logged and accessible for admins to filter by date, service, and action.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: All user interactions should be logged and retrievable for monitoring and compliance audits.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user action, When the action is performed, Then it should be logged and displayed in the interaction history.

user_stories.title: Implement data retention and privacy policies
user_stories.description: As a compliance officer, I want enforced data retention and privacy policies, so that the system complies with regulations.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Policies should define the retention period for interaction logs and ensure privacy requirements.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Interaction logs should comply with defined retention and privacy policies, ensuring regulatory adherence.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the data retention policy, When logs reach their retention period, Then they should be securely deleted as per the policy.

user_stories.title: Design a consistent and responsive UI
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive UI, so that I can use the portal effectively on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The UI should adjust seamlessly to various screen sizes, be visually consistent, and performant.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The interface should work flawlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am using a mobile device, When I access the portal, Then the layout should be responsive and visually appealing.

user_stories.title: Ensure WCAG 2.1 accessibility compliance
user_stories.description: As a user with disabilities, I want the portal to be compliant with accessibility standards, so that I can use it without barriers.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The portal must meet WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure accessibility for users with disabilities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should be usable by individuals with disabilities, adhering to WCAG 2.1 guidelines.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have visual impairments, When using the portal, Then I should navigate and understand the content without barriers.

user_stories.epic_title: Database Layer and Core Banking Integration
user_stories.title: Integrate with core banking system
user_stories.description: As a backend developer, I want the portal integrated with the core banking system, so that data synchronization and performance are maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should be seamless using APIs and middleware, maintaining data consistency and performance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal and core banking system should be fully integrated, ensuring real-time data synchronization.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a transaction occurs, When it is processed by the core banking system, Then the portal should reflect the updated transaction status in real-time.

user_stories.epic_title: Database Layer and Core Banking Integration
user_stories.title: Deploy a high-performance database layer
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want a high-performance database layer, so that the portal operates smoothly under load.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The database should utilize caching and ensure secure data handling with robust error management.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The database layer should provide fast operations, handle errors gracefully, and ensure data integrity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given high user load, When accessing the portal, Then the database should perform optimally without errors.
